subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=zhā,zā,zhá
|m_note=zhā - “to stab, to prick, to puncture”; zā (Mainland), zhá (Taiwan) - “to fasten, to tie, to bind”; zhā (Mainland), zhá (Taiwan) - “to be stationed”; zhá - used in {{zh-l|*掙扎}} and {{zh-l|*扎掙}}
|c=zaat3,zaap3
|h=pfs=
|md=
|mn=chah/chat
|mn_note=chah - vernacular; chat - literary
|mn-t=zab4/zag4/za4
|mn-t_note=zag4 - “to fasten, to tie, to bind”, used in {{zh-l|*掙扎}} and {{zh-l|*扎掙}})
|w=
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=v,cl
}}
